meanings.definition: The state or quality of being outside or beyond a norm or limit.
meanings.sent1: His unconventional ideas often led him into the extralities of society.
meanings.sent2: The extralities of her imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The extralities of his fashion sense made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared into the extralities of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The extralities of his dreams were as vast as the ocean.

meanings.definition: Things that are outside the normal scope or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the extralities of the forest revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The extralities of the internet can be both fascinating and overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: She always enjoyed venturing into the extralities of the city.
meanings.sent4: The extralities of the unknown beckoned to the curious explorer.
meanings.sent5: The extralities of the desert landscape were breathtaking in their vastness.
